Tweet: Crazy atmosphere at the Kalinga Stadium Bhubaneswar for the Men’s #HWCFinal2018! Loving the energy and the passion for hockey in this stunning stadium!
Kudos to @Naveen_Odisha & @TheHockeyIndia for putting up this world class event!
Nice to see the Indian fast bowling looking more hostile than the Australian fast bowling attack. Keep firing it in guys... #INDvAUS

It has been a wonderful World Cup hosted in Odisha! This tournament will definitely inspire many young kids to take up Hockey as a sport. All the best to the Netherlands and Belgium teams for the Final today. See you there. #HWC2018 #HumBhiHockey #DilHockeypic.twitter.com/6VCpkwx8oC
Many congratulations @Pvsindhu1 for winning your maiden title at the BWF World Tour Finals. Wishing you all the best for the future. #BWFWorldTourFinals2018pic.twitter.com/US8NXCbALY
Australia have got a very special spinner in @NathLyon421. He has got terrific variations and uses the pace and bounce from the pitch to extract maximum value. #INDvAUS
